instrument

	


	
start

		./instrument layer start

		
options

			recycling instrument layer start --name instrument-1
			recycling instrument layer start --name instrument-1 --layer-port 50000 --mongo-port 50001

			recycling instrument layer move make-vibe
			recycling instrument layer move list-vibes


			
	
HTTP(S) API

		http://localhost:50000/


	
structure

		[dir] instrument-1
			[dir] moon
				db:wallet
					collection:vibe [{
						"public": {
							"hexadecimal string": ""
						},
						"private": {
							"hexadecimal string": ""
						},
						"seed": {
							"hexadecimal string": ""
						}
					}]
					
		
		names:
			./names
		
		agenda:
			./__agenda/agenda
